objectiveText: Be the first player to collect 7 divine artifacts (one of each theme) and reach the end of the board on Mount Olympus.
howToPlaySteps: On your turn, click the dice to roll it.
Your pawn will move the number of spaces indicated.
If you land on a themed space, you will answer a question. If you get it right, you win the artifact of that theme (if you don't already have it).
The difficulty of the question increases as you collect more artifacts.
Watch out for Special Spaces! They can help or hinder you.
victoryConditionText: After collecting all 7 artifacts, race to be the first to reach exactly the final space on the board.
